title: Cyberpunk 2077 next-gen update arrives on Xbox Series X/S and PS5
content:
CD Projekt Red, best known for The Witcher series of video games, released its science-fiction game Cyberpunk 2077 at the end of 2020. The game was widely criticized at launch for software bugs, especially on consoles, and it lacked full support for the then-new Xbox Series X/S and PlayStation 5. CD Projekt Red said a few months

The post Cyberpunk 2077 next-gen update arrives on Xbox Series X/S and PS5 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: CD Projekt Red has released patch v1.5 for Cyberpunk 2077, which adds native Xbox Series X/S and PS5 support and other improvements.
